alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 2:36AM EST until March 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Far Northern, Interior DownEast and Penobscot Valley Maine. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook
